notes: Triggers upon taking damage greater than 0 (before reductions) from any unit. Does not trigger on damage flagged as HP Removal.
Applies a strong dispel on the wielder upon activating, and heals them.
Can save the wielder from dying, healing them back up even from 0 health.
abilities.description: When the wearer's health falls below 15% they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for 300 health.
